author: Was a loyal customer
title: Was a loyal customer
text:
Your customer service was rude and did not listen to my concerns. The supervisor told me that there was no one that I could talk to after him. He was the final word. He was awful. I've worked in IT as a senior manager for years. I know there is always another escalation point.
I will probably never buy from Groupon again. I have told many of my friends and family of this experience.
